entry.string: ICD-10 alpha-numeric representation of the disease entity
A string that can be used to sort the children of a category. This is not the ICD code.
The "Title" is the term for any ICD concept (unit, entity or category) which labels the intended concept in a meaningful, unambiguous way
Full text definitions that were pre-populated from ICD 10 or from other terminologies
iCAT will be updated soon to accommodate this functionality. At this time, please refrain from entering content for this parameter.
DRAFT HINT: Specifies the linearization in which this category should be used
Edit linearization specific sorting label only if it is different from the default sorting label
iCAT will be updated soon to accommodate this functionality. At this time, please refrain from entering content for this parameter.
Synonyms are alternative names for the same underlying concept (e.g. common terms, medical jargon)
Inclusion terms are either synonyms of the category titles or subclasses which are not represented in the classification hierarchy
Exclusion terms help users eliminate entities that should be assigned to a different ICD category because of differences in meaning or terminology
iCAT will be updated soon to accommodate this functionality. At this time, please refrain from entering content for this parameter.

DRAFT HINT: Object or Substance Producing Injury
DRAFT HINT: Place of Occurrence Descriptors
DRAFT HINT: Activity when Injured Descriptors
